title: Peatyâ€™s LinkLube Wet is a biodegradable chain lube w/ an Irish coffee scent
content:
Steve Peat has added a new drivetrain lubricant to his line of bicycle maintenance products. Joining the Peaty’s Dry Link Lube and All-Weather Link Lube is the all-new Link Lube Wet. Link the rest of the range, it is environmentally friendly, with a readily biodegradable formula said to keep your drivetrain running smooth in the […]

The post Peaty’s LinkLube Wet is a biodegradable chain lube w/ an Irish coffee scent appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
